name: items
description: List of items to display. Please refer to the component source for the `Item` type definition.

name: isTooltipDisplayed
description: Determines if the tooltip is displayed when hovering over the component.

name: maxDisplayed
description: Maximum number of items to display. If the number of items is greater than this value, a `+X` counter will be displayed.

name: stacked
description: Determines if the avatars are displayed in a stacked layout.
